ModMetaData.name: Portraits of the Rim
ModMetaData.author: TwoPenny
ModMetaData.description:
It's a portrait generation mod. Neat!
Portrait Art by: TwoPennyDoodle Meysmerized (Rimsenal Hairs)
Splash Art by TwoPennyDoodle "Gender Punk" pin by Mothimistic Mod page art base by Erin. C# framework by the fantastic Taranchuk, continued mod support by the ever-diligent Bunbunbunnies Emotional support and advice from Oskar Potocki and Erin and many other devs (Thank you guys so much) Coordination with Taranchuk and big senpai energy from Oskar Potocki Gradient Hair advice and insight from bolphen
Translations by: Chinese - Laurence042 Russian - Unfortunate–îpyr
